item.description:
This is a Yes Dance party-I ask you to be respectful and say yes to anyone who asks you to dance once- please understand this is our number one value- if you are able to say yes then this is a great event for you to attend.

Format:
Location is in a warm, loving and relaxing home environment.

Admission: $10.00 Open bar-just for Holidays
$5.00 if you don't drink wine or beer

Men and women bring healthy food selection
Make it a festive occasion/celebration for the Holidays

Organizer/Host- Richard Tosti

1. "Time of party: 6:30PM -10:00pm"
2. " Dress code- "business casual" - No shoes, jeans, or sneakers- stockings good
3. "You can enjoy the people, music and dance if you like"
4. Initial temperature will be 68 the first hour. Body heat will warm up the room to a comfortable 70-72 degrees in one hour.

Purpose is to Socialize with similar people of your age who are searching for a lifetime partner.
30-50 age group.-strict adherence to age

I began these parties in my home in July 2006-twice a month

Our common Values: Common denominator
Have fun meeting old and new friends
Circulate, talk to everyone.
If someone is alone go up to them and say hi!
Nonsmokers
Please be Friendly, Positive, and optimistic to everyone.

Please invite other friends, Particularly men.

We have an equal number of men and women. The past party we had-10- men and 10 women.

This group was formed on the principle of synergy. Working together to invite quality people. We must take responsibility for inviting people. My personal goal is to always have an equal ratio of men and women, hope you will help.

Maximum - 40 guests only.

Let's have fun!

Location and Directions -You will see open house signs-simple
My Home
44 Pickman Drive
Bedford, MA
128- Exit route 4/225 toward Bedford, 3.9 miles (stay right at two forks in road-
-left on Dudley (Huckins Farm sign lite up) and left on Pickman

The best is yet to be!

Richard Tosti
item.name: Singles Home Dance Party
